resources.string: - Enable sound will give a sound when two things are paired. The voulme can be controlled using mobile volume controls.
- Enable timer mode if you want to play game in time challenge mode
- Select Easy, Medium or Difficult mode
- Select game category like Alphabets, numbers, animals or vegetables
- Start by clicking on left top box and keep on clicking next boxes in right direction and keep remembering their positions
- Pair things and complete in least moves
- Check your ratings with stars. Complete in targeted moves to get higher ratings and stars.

Contents in this app are considered to be of public domain and I tried my best to give credits back to those owners/organisations. All materials including but not limited to contents, images are sole property of their respective owners.
